ingredients.ingredient: 3 tablespoons plain yogurt with active cultures

cookingTips: Heat milk to 180°F and cool to 110°F before adding starter culture
Maintain consistent temperature between 100-110°F for 6-8 hours for proper culturing
Use fresh yogurt starter with live active cultures for best results
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What temperature control method will give me consistently creamy yogurt?
